languages.text: "Напротив — это наш шанс узнать больше. Извлечь пользу из страданий — единственное, что оправдает мучения этих несчастных. Последний способ для них послужить Трону".

traits.locale_text: "Напротив — это решение здравое. Извлечь пользу из страданий — единственное, что оправдает мучения этих несчастных".

languages.text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."
languages.original_text: "Напротив — это наш шанс узнать больше. Извлечь пользу из страданий — единственное, что оправдает мучения этих несчастных. Последний способ для них послужить Трону".

traits.locale_text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

"You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

"You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

"You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

languages.text: “你错了，这是我们寻找线索的机会。只有从他们的痛苦中找到有用的东西，才不会让这些不幸之人所受的折磨毫无意义。这也是他们最后一次侍奉黄金王座服务的方式。”
languages.original_text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

traits.locale_text: “你错了，这是我们寻找线索的机会。只有从他们的痛苦中找到有用的东西，才不会让这些不幸之人所受的折磨毫无意义。这也是他们最后一次侍奉黄金王座服务的方式。”

languages.text: «Se equivoca: esta es nuestra oportunidad de descubrir algo más. Conseguir algún beneficio de su sufrimiento es lo único que puede justificar el tormento de estos desdichados. Será su último servicio al Trono».
languages.original_text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

traits.locale_text: «Se equivoca: esta es nuestra oportunidad de descubrir algo más. Conseguir algún beneficio de su sufrimiento es lo único que puede justificar el tormento de estos desdichados. Será su último servicio al Trono».

languages.text: 「あなたは間違っている…これはより詳しく知るチャンスなのだ。苦しみから善なるものを引き出せば、不幸な人々の苦しみを正義のものとすることができる。それが、彼らが最後に玉座に奉仕することができる方法なのだ」
languages.original_text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは間違っている…これはより詳しく知るチャンスなのだ。苦しみから善なるものを引き出せば、不幸な人々の苦しみを正義のものとすることができる。それが、彼らが最後に玉座に奉仕することができる方法なのだ」

languages.text: "Ihr irrt – das ist unsere Chance, mehr herauszufinden. Aus dem Leid etwas Gutes zu ziehen, ist das Einzige, was die Qual dieser unglücklichen Menschen rechtfertigt. So können sie dem Thron ein letztes Mal dienen."
languages.original_text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr irrt – das ist unsere Chance, mehr herauszufinden. Aus dem Leid etwas Gutes zu ziehen, ist das Einzige, was die Qual dieser unglücklichen Menschen rechtfertigt. So können sie dem Thron ein letztes Mal dienen."

languages.text: « Vous vous trompez, nous devons saisir cette chance d'en apprendre davantage. Donnons un sens au tourment de ces malheureux en tirant quelque chose d'utile de leur souffrance. Ainsi, ils serviront le Trône une dernière fois. »
languages.original_text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous trompez, nous devons saisir cette chance d'en apprendre davantage. Donnons un sens au tourment de ces malheureux en tirant quelque chose d'utile de leur souffrance. Ainsi, ils serviront le Trône une dernière fois. »

languages.text: "Yanlışın var. Bu fırsatı yeni bilgiler edinmek için kullanabiliriz. Bu zavallıların çektiği ızdırabı haklı kılacak tek şey, bundan iyi bir şey çıkarmak olacaktır. Bu vesileyle Taht'a son bir defa hizmet edebilirler."
languages.original_text: "You're wrong — this is our chance to find out more. Extracting some good from suffering is the only thing that will justify the torment of these unfortunate people. It is how they can serve the Throne one last time."

traits.locale_text: “Yanlışın var. Bu fırsatı daha çok bilgi edinmek için kullanabiliriz. Bu zavallı insanların çektiği ızdırabı haklı kılacak tek şey, bundan iyi bir şey çıkarmak olacaktır. Bu vesileyle Taht’a son bir defa hizmet edebilirler.”
